title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: When retrieving datetime values from a table, the format displayed in the dynamic text item differs from the format displayed in the data/text item.
OB: When inputting 'new Date()' as content for three items, saving and previewing the form, the dynamic text item displayed a different format compared to the data and text items.
EB: The expected result is that all three items should show the same format for the datetime values.
SR: To reproduce the issue, insert a text item, a data item, and a dynamic text item in a form that retrieves datetime values from a table.
